main_page_text.title: Iced Drinks
main_page_text.description: Costa Iced drinks are refreshing and delicious beverages served cold with ice. They come in a variety of flavors such as coffee, tea, and fruit-based drinks. Perfect for hot summer days or whenever you need a cool drink.

main_page_text.title: Latte
main_page_text.description: Indulge in the creamy, smooth taste of a Costa latte - a rich and luxurious blend of espresso and velvety milk. Served with a beautiful, delicate foam and finished with a sprinkling of chocolate powder, our Costa latte is the perfect pick-me-up to savor throughout the day. Treat yourself to the ultimate coffee experience today!

main_page_text.title: Canned Drinks
main_page_text.description: Costa Canned drinks are ready-to-drink beverages available in a range of flavors such as Classic Latte, Caramel Latte, and Americano. These convenient and portable drinks are perfect for on-the-go and can be enjoyed chilled or at room temperature.

drinks.title: Iced Latte Every Day
drinks.slogan: Ice, ice, latte. Cool and creamy.
drinks.name: Iced Latte
drinks.description: A Costa iced latte is a refreshing cold drink made with shots of espresso, fresh milk, and a touch of sweetness. Perfect for hot summer days or as a mid-day pick-me-up.

drinks.title: Cold Brew Every Day
drinks.name: Cold Brew
drinks.description: Cold brew is a delicious and refreshing coffee beverage that is made by steeping coffee grounds in cold water for an extended period of time. The result is a smooth and less acidic coffee that is perfect for hot summer days or anytime you want a refreshing iced coffee drink.

drinks.title: Chai Tea Latte
drinks.slogan: Spice up your life, on ice
drinks.name: Chai Tea Latte
drinks.description: Chai Tea Iced Latte is a delicious and refreshing beverage made with spiced tea and milk, served over ice. Its a perfect combination of sweet and spicy flavors that is perfect for hot summer days or anytime you want a unique and flavorful iced drink.

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
drinks.description: Are you not a fan of coffee? Don't worry, we are experts in the making of Hot Chocolate. Sugar or no sugar, no problem, AND we will include some whipped cream if you wish!

drinks.title: Coffee + Chocolate = Mocha

drinks.description: Are you a fan of Coffee AND Hot Chocolate? Then, the mocha mixes the strenght of both drinks into one. The sweetness of the hot choclate with the energy punch given by coffee, all in one simple package.

accordion.title: 1) I'm experiencing issues with the App
accordion.explanation: If the scan on your device fails whilst using the app at a till, check with the barista and try again. Baristas can also add your Beans retrospectively if the issue continues. If you’re using the app at an Express machine and the scan on your device fails, please try again and double check that you are connected to Wi-fi. For help with any other app related issue, see here.

accordion.title: 2) How can I register to Costa Club?
accordion.explanation: It's simple! Download our Costa Club app to register and start collecting beans today. If you have a plastic card, you can register it here.

accordion.title: 3) How can I replace my lost card?
accordion.explanation: Log in to your Costa Club account here and select the ‘Card’ tab. Here, you’ll find instructions on how to replace your card. You can also download our app and login to start collecting beans. Don’t worry! You won’t lose the beans you’ve collected on your lost card, as all your beans will show in your account.
